display_name: Abinadi’s Warning to Noah and His People: A Reversal of the Exodus

pages.title: Abinadi and Isaiah: Who Are the Lord’s People?

sections.heading: Did you know that Abinadi references passages in Isaiah that explain that the Lord’s people are those who hearken to His laws?

pages.title: Abinadi’s Warning to Noah and His People: A Reversal of the Exodus

sections.heading: Did you know that Abinadi warned Noah and his people that the Lord would reverse the blessings of the Exodus for them, if they did not repent?

pages.title: Abinadi’s Warning: Smitten Like the Egyptians

sections.heading: Did you know that when King Noah’s people rejected the Lord’s prophetic warning, he smote them with plagues like those suffered by the Egyptians?

pages.title: Chart of Isaiah’s and Abinadi’s Words

sections.heading: Below are additional examples where Abinadi may be drawing upon Isaiah’s words, phrases, and ideas.
